methods.name: escape
methods.desc: Escapes the passed string for ' and \

methods.name: leftPad

params.name: size
params.desc: The total length of the output string

params.name: char
params.desc: (optional) The character with which to pad the original string (defaults to empty string " ")

methods.name: toggle

params.name: value
params.desc: The value to compare to the current string

params.name: other
params.desc: The new value to use if the string already equals the first value passed in

methods.name: format

params.name: string
params.desc: The tokenized string to be formatted

methods.name: unicodeClean
methods.desc: Remove invalid unicode characters from a string
